name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior HubSpot Engineer with 8 years of full-stack development experience, I possess strong skills in integrating and automating workflows using **HubSpot**, **API**, and **REST APIs**. My technical proficiency also includes **JavaScript**, **HTML**, and **CSS**, enabling me to create versatile solutions tailored for CRM and automation needs. I have effectively utilized tools like **Zapier** and **Workato** to streamline processes and enhance data manipulation capabilities.

In my previous roles, I have developed and managed automated pipelines and workflows aimed at improving operational efficiency. My expertise in data handling and problem-solving allows me to tackle complex challenges with attention to detail. I have successfully communicated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-performance solutions that meet business objectives, particularly in sectors focused on technology-driven growth.
